title: Story of Home LLC Laundry Room Decal Laundry Vinyl Wall Decal Laundry Room Door Decal
features: It’s another day. Another load. Another pile of laundry. What’s a person to do? While you can’t wave a magical wand and wish away the loads, you can at least make your laundry room look and feel a little more magical. Use this laundry room wall decal to create a space that is as stylish as it is useful. This wall decal is sure to help you to keep your laundry room decor and your clothes fresh! :)
It’s FUN, EASY, & AFFORDABLE. Beautiful matte finish vinyl provides you with a hand-painted look that looks great in any light. No glare, means your decal will look perfect in any room at any angle.
This laundry room decal comes in 3 sizes; 6" H X 22" W, 8" H X 29" W, 10" H X 36" W
EASY TO INSTALL; Application instructions are included; Adheres to any type of smooth & clean surface in your home.
No-hassle money-back guarantee if you are unsatisfied for any reason. This laundry room wall sticker and all our products are made in the USA.
description: Laundry Room | Laundry Room Wall Decal  It’s another day. Another load. Another pile of laundry. What’s a person to do?  While you can’t wave a magical wand and wish away the loads, you can at least make your laundry room look and feel a little more magical. Use this laundry room wall decal to create a space that is as stylish as it is useful. This wall decal is sure to help you to keep your laundry room decor and your clothes fresh! :)   Every home looks its best when the decor reflects a unique style and personality.  For that reason, all of our products are designed to give your home a look that reflects your personal style.  See all the different designs and products we have to accentuate your home's decor in every room. It's fun, easy, and now more affordable than ever to bring your personal style to life in your home. With over 500 designs to choose from, you will find plenty of interior design inspiration and gift ideas here!  At Story of Home Decals we offer you the highest quality vinyl wall decals and decorative wood signs for every room in your home. This laundry wall decal is a perfect addition to your laundry room, laundry wall, above your washer, dryer, sink, or any spot in your laundry room.  Our manufacturing process is engineered to provide you with wall stickers and rustic signs of the highest quality. The signs and decals you receive will have been crafted with the utmost care, dedicated to providing you with house warming art that you will love and proudly display in your home. We use only the highest grade Premium Rated Vinyl for all of our vinyl decals, signs, and wall art. And as always, we promise to go the extra mile to ensure you’re satisfied!   Your style. Your story. Your Home.
